Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any information.
Understate: The claim does not appear to understate any information.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement that Russian President Vladimir Putin cancelled a campaign appearance with Donald Trump.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Putin cancelled the campaign appearance solely because of the video controversy, without considering any other possible reasons.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why Putin cancelled the campaign appearance.
